subject: Unregistered use of SyMon after the 30 day evaluation period is in violation of U.
body:

Beta and Delta in the carrier's wake. But what finally worked was a combination 
of old methods and new, of discipline and a sense of fun, punishment and reward.

A small, dynamically-typed object-oriented 
language, based on prototypes and delegation.
With a ten-foot long gash through both walls, as 
neat as any stoneworker could have done, and bits of tapestry lying on the 
floor. Two flowers, both of them fair, living red, rare of scent, a shining 
rose, a glistening carnation.

the buttons (initially invisible and disabled because the sheet is modeless), 
and resize the view to fit the sheet.
